verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] deepening his investment in the midterm elections , stepping up his travel across the country to raise money and rally Republicans in hopes of overcoming the tide of history by retaining control of Congress in the fall .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: deepening] [ARG1: his investment in the midterm elections] , [ARGM-ADV: stepping up his travel across the country to raise money and rally Republicans in hopes of overcoming the tide of history by retaining control of Congress in the fall] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is deepening his investment in the midterm elections , [V: stepping] up [ARG1: his travel across the country] [ARGM-PRP: to raise money and rally Republicans in hopes of overcoming the tide of history by retaining control of Congress in the fall] .

President Donald Trump is deepening his investment in the midterm elections , stepping up his travel across the country to [V: raise] [ARG1: money] and rally Republicans [ARGM-PRP: in hopes of overcoming the tide of history by retaining control of Congress in the fall] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is deepening his investment in the midterm elections , stepping up his travel across the country to raise money and [V: rally] [ARG1: Republicans] [ARGM-PRP: in hopes of overcoming the tide of history by retaining control of Congress in the fall] .

President Donald Trump is deepening his investment in the midterm elections , stepping up his travel across the country to raise money and rally Republicans in hopes of [V: overcoming] [ARG1: the tide of history] [ARGM-MNR: by retaining control of Congress in the fall] .

President Donald Trump is deepening his investment in the midterm elections , stepping up his travel across the country to raise money and rally Republicans in hopes of overcoming the tide of history by [V: retaining] [ARG1: control of Congress] [ARGM-TMP: in the fall] .
